item.title: How do i change a weapons stance?
item.dc:creator: @Skelebob Skelebob
item.description:
@Skelebob wrote:

I believe it’s in Client.Java

Eg.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13998 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13999 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12217) // godsword { [b]return 407[/b]; }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) // guthans spear
{
return 2080;
}

My guess is the RETURNs, because when i changed the return of the godsword, i held and attacked with it differently.

Read full topic
